summary:
{
  "summary": "A test suite that verifies the authentication client’s ability to obtain access tokens using different grant types, including interactive authorization code exchange, direct username/password credentials, and silent token refresh.",
  "business_intent": "To ensure reliable and secure token acquisition across multiple authentication flows, thereby supporting consistent access to protected services for applications and users.",
  "keywords": [
    "authentication",
    "token acquisition",
    "authorization code flow",
    "username password",
    "silent refresh",
    "unit testing",
    "OAuth",
    "security",
    "access token"
  ]
}
```
